titleStmt.title: The maidens blush: or, Ioseph mirror of modesty, map of pietie, maze of destinie, or rather diuine prouidence. From the Latin of Fracastorius, translated; & dedicated to the high-hopefull Charles, Prince of Wales. By Iosuah Syluester.
Joseph. English
titleStmt.author: Fracastoro, Girolamo, 1478-1553.

titleStmt.title: The maidens blush: or, Ioseph mirror of modesty, map of pietie, maze of destinie, or rather diuine prouidence. From the Latin of Fracastorius, translated; & dedicated to the high-hopefull Charles, Prince of Wales. By Iosuah Syluester.
Joseph. English
titleStmt.author: Fracastoro, Girolamo, 1478-1553.
Sylvester, Josuah, 1563-1618.

notesStmt.note: A translation by Sylvester of: Joseph.
At least two known copies are bound with "Tobacco battered" by Josuah Sylvester, the pagination of which continues from this item.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Lacking title page; title page and duplicate A3 from Huntington copy 22318 v.3 pt.1 filmed at beginning.
